name: Stickman Fighter - Shadow Fighting Games For Boys
name_original: Stickman Fighter - Shadow Fighting Games For Boys
description:
Stickman Fighter is back! LIMITED TIME OFFER: NEW USER BONUS! Download NOW before it expires!
Are you ready to protect the world from evil forces?

Turn your device to a killing machine!

Escape the terrorist base, run and jump, and do a stickman turbo dismount to avoid gunshots, aim and shoot to eliminate evil forces!

Variety of weapons to choose from!
From 45cal Pistols, Machine Gun, Katana, and you can even call 'Air Support' !!! Don't forget your trusty ol' flippy knife too when things go hand to hand and get heated!

Play with your friends, just log in to Facebook and fight the enemies along side your mates!

*** FEATURES ***
● Amazing game controls!
● 3D graphics
● Earn coins and upgrade your weapons
● Play with your Facebook friends!
● Realistic Sound and FX Music
● Enjoy hours of stickman turbo dismount fighting fun for FREE!

Avoid getting hurt and shoot your enemies down! Wield your flippy knife if things get crazy!

Download Stickman Fighter now while its free and get your stickman turbo dismount on! Flippy knife and gun slinging good times await!
